EmailTemplate.name: SalesForce Log In Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Office Depot Soft Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!User.FirstName},
Your salesforce.com team would like to send you a gentle reminder that it's been a while since your last login.
We would like to encourage you to start using this as a tool that will increase your productivity . If you're having any difficulty navigating the tool or have questions, do not hesitate to send a message to salesforce@officedepot.com or call us at (877) ODP-BSD1 Option 5.
Warm Regards,
Your salesforce.com team
